item.title: No More Deals with Iran, Mr. President
item.description: Envoy Steve Witkoff’s handling of negotiations with Hamas is a troubling sign.

item.title: Senate Confirms Pete Hegseth As America’s Next Defense Secretary
item.description: Following a months-long media smear campaign, the Senate voted to confirm Pete Hegseth as America's next defense secretary Friday night.

item.title: Kristi Noem beats Senate confirmation hurdle, advancing to final vote for DHS role
item.description: Kristi Noem cleared a key procedural hurdle in the Senate on Friday, teeing up her final confirmation vote for early Sunday.

item.title: Budgeting for Prosperity: Spending Limits or Structural Balance?
item.description: Adopting spending limits at all levels of government would empower taxpayers, incentivize growth, and create a stable fiscal environment.

item.title: Nobody Has a Right to Security Clearances
item.description: Revoking the clearances for the signatories of the ‘Hunter Biden letter’ is a penalty that was richly and justly deserved.

item.title: ‘More Babies In The United States Of America’: Trump, Vance Signal New Era At March For Life
